definitions.title: n.pr.loc
definitions.body: in Judah Jos 15:41, near Beth Horon Jos 10:10, and Libnah v:Jos 10:29, where was a cave v:Jos 10:16, v:Jos 10:17, cf. v:Jos 10:21, captured by Jos v:Jos 10:28, with a king v:Jos 10:28, Jos 12:16. LXX Makhda. Site dubious, Warren;Survey Mem.ii. 411 ff., 427 comp. El-mughâr, c. 2 3/4 miles SW. from Ekron.
